trustfund:
TF025316-PHRD-ECONOMIC & FINANCIAL
            MANAGEMENT PROJ.,TF030486-JAPAN CTF - FY04 GENERAL: LAC
            (ALL COUNTRIES IN LATIN AMERICA AND THE C

abstracts.cdata!:
This report amends the Development
            Credit Agreement of the Honduras Economic and Financial
            Management Project (Cr. No. 3414- HO.). Although the
            original development objective would remain valid, the
            proposed Amendment as outlined in Section IV of the
            amendment document, would restructure the ongoing operation
            to better align it to the public sector reform priorities
            introduced by the Administration that assumed office in
            January 2002. Namely, a new component, Administrative Reform
            and Public Sector Reengineering (Component E) would be added
            to support a series of comprehensive studies and
            administrative reform strategies which would provide the
            basis for future reengineering of the public sector.
            Additionally, since a comprehensive Inter-American
            Development Bank-sponsored project will support the
            development and implementation of the new Public Procurement
            Law, the limited support that was originally envisioned
            under the Public Procurement Component (original Component
            E) would no longer be necessary. Therefore, this component
            would be dropped and proceeds reallocated to reinforce
            Government efforts in remaining components.
